sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import MetaData from '../layout/MetaData'; import { useAlert } from 'react-alert' import { useStripe, useElements, CardNumberElement, CardExpiryElement, CardCvcElement } from '@stripe/react-stripe-js' import axios from 'axios' const options = { styles: { base: { fontSize: '16px' }, invalid: { color: '#9e2146' } } } const Payment = ({ history }) => { const alert = useAlert() const stripe = useStripe() const elements = useElements() const dispatch = useDispatch() const { user } = useSelector(state => state.auth) const { cartItems, shippingInfo } = useSelector(state => state.cart) useEffect(() => { }, []) return (

Checkout

{user && user.name}

{shippingInfo.phoneNo}

{shippingInfo.address}

{`${shippingInfo.city}, ${shippingInfo.postalCode}`}

{ cartItems.map(item => (
{item.name}

{item.quantity} x Rp.{item.price} = Rp.{item.quantity * item.price}

 )) }
Pembayaran
 ) } export default Payment
